weapon.name: Mjolnir

weapon.name: Light and Shadow

weapon.skilltwodetail: Releases cold air when elite’s shield got broken by basic attack (branch attack and charged attack included), reduce movement speed and attack speed to the target and small surrounding enemies by  84%, last for 3.99 seconds

weapon.name: The Energy Leaper

The whirlwind exlode when expires, dealing 300% physical damage, and inflicting 60% slowing moving speed and attack speed to the enemy, last for 1.50 seconds, Kiana can move during whirlwind duration (EP Consumption: 24 – Cooldown: 30s)
weapon.skilltwodetail: 5% chance on-hit to increase moving speed by 100%, last for 4.50 seconds

weapon.name: Usurper Hand Cannon

weapon.name: Proto Spirit Bow

weapon.name: Mutated - Bow of Hel

weapon.name: Judgement of Shamash - Gun
weapon.skillonedetail:
Fires off holy fire dealing 100% attack power + 2*1978 fire elemental damage. Apply a debuff that lowers enemy’s attack and movement speed by 30% and increase receiving all-damage by 15%. Holy fire deals 265 fire elemental damage per second with a 10% chance of apply stun status for 2.5 seconds. 
During release, wielder get 80% all-damage reduction. Performing skill consumes 13% of maximum HP per each second, last for 5 seconds. If HP reaches 1, the character will not die as a result. When HP below 33%, skill will be unusable (EP Consumption: 20 – Cooldown: 35s)
weapon.skilltwodetail:
10% chance to inflict burn status per each 1.0 second to surrounding enemy, dealing  298 damage per each 0.5 second, last for 3.5 second. Increase all damage against burn status enemies by 18% 
Weapon Buff – God’s Key: When weapon’s level increase, the weapon will give buff to users.
This skill is activated automatically and cannot be turn on or off. Has a time limit.
Lv 30: Increase all Pistol-users DEF by 40 
Lv 35: Increase all Pistol-users ATK by 10 
Lv 40: Increase all Pistol-users HP by 75 
Lv 45: Increase all Pistol-users CRI by 10 
Lv 50: Increase all Pistol-users ATK by 30
